summary: Blog feature testing completed. Found 2 critical bugs: (1) 3 sample blog posts return 404 when accessed individually, (2) Category filtering doesn't work with sample posts. Frontend UI is well-designed and functional.

critical.issue: 3 sample posts (nouveautes-apple-2025, routine-beaute-naturelle, guide-televiseur-4k) return 404 because get_sample_blog_post() only defines 3 posts while get_sample_blog_posts() returns 6 posts
critical.fix: Add missing 3 posts to get_sample_blog_post() function in server.py around line 5714

critical.issue: Category filter parameter is accepted but doesn't filter sample posts - returns all 6 posts regardless of category
critical.fix: Modify get_sample_blog_posts() to accept category parameter and filter results

integration_issues.issue: When backend returns 404, frontend shows generic 'Article' title with placeholder content instead of proper error page
